channel.title: What can I do to change this?
channel.description: Ok on my server, teleblock works, but the person can still use the emote list to tele out, such as "train". How can I make it where the emotes list doesn't work in wildy or where teleblock makes it where u cant use emotes list.

item.title: What can I do to change this?
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

[code]case 169: //train tele
if(emotes == 0)
{

			teleportToX = 3253;
	                teleportToY = 3431;
			}
			else
			{
				emotes = 0;
				pEmote = playerSE;
				updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
			break;[/code]

Where would i put that stuff to make it work where u cant tele block?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2007, 06:25:07 PM[/size][hr]Omg, ty a lot, I figured it out and now train tele doesn’t work =)

Read full topic
item.source: What can I do to change this?

item.title: What can I do to change this?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Add This Under The Case

{ if(teleblock) { sendMessage("You are currently teleblocked and cannot tele n00blet"); } else if (!teleblock) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("MESSAGE HERE."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: What can I do to change this?

item.title: What can I do to change this?
item.dc:creator: @Paulthegoat2 Paulthegoat2
item.description:
@Paulthegoat2 wrote:

if {teleblock}
}
sendMessage(“You can’t do that here”)

That is not the exact code, but it has something to do with that, so you can search for part of that in your client to see if it already has it.

By the way you would add it under the part where it declares where your emote teleports you.
